content: Thank you so much! I know you just got here, but I really appreciate you helping out.
I shall continue fishing. Perhaps we can fish together sometime. Farewell.
Pardon my surprise earlier, I wasn't expecting anyone to come here, even though it is quite a peaceful place... But since you just arrived, I won't go into all that.
Is that okay? Fishing is hard
If you don't mind, please accept this <color=#599d63>black carp</color> as a welcome gift.
Don't worry about accepting itâ€”I actually know quite a bit about the art of fishing.
